Sentencas: The suitability of double perovskite oxides of composition Sr2Mg1-xNixMoO6-delta (SMNM, x = 0-0.9) as anode materials for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) was evaluated.
Titulo: Electrical, Chemical, and Electrochemical Properties of Double Perovskite Oxides Sr2Mg1-xNixMoO6-δ as Anode Materials for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Single double perovskite structures could be obtained up to x = 0.9 in syntheses at ambient atmosphere.
Titulo: Electrical, Chemical, and Electrochemical Properties of Double Perovskite Oxides Sr2Mg1-xNixMoO6-δ as Anode Materials for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: However, after reduction at 800 degrees C, trace amounts of impurities were detected in the sample with x = 0.9, suggesting that the upper limit for the Ni content (x) in SMNM is less than 0.9 under SOFC operating conditions.
Titulo: Electrical, Chemical, and Electrochemical Properties of Double Perovskite Oxides Sr2Mg1-xNixMoO6-δ as Anode Materials for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The electrical conductivity of SMNM increases with increasing Ni content because of the increase in the concentration of electronic defects, [Mo-Mo6+(5+)], and the decreased band gap energy, as revealed by first-principles calculations.
Titulo: Electrical, Chemical, and Electrochemical Properties of Double Perovskite Oxides Sr2Mg1-xNixMoO6-δ as Anode Materials for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The substitution of Ni can facilitate the charge-transfer process of the electrode reaction, decrease the polarization resistance, and thus increase the power density of a single cell.
Titulo: Electrical, Chemical, and Electrochemical Properties of Double Perovskite Oxides Sr2Mg1-xNixMoO6-δ as Anode Materials for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Xray photoelectron spectroscopy and temperature-programmed reduction measurements were used to explain the reason for the performance improvement.
Titulo: Electrical, Chemical, and Electrochemical Properties of Double Perovskite Oxides Sr2Mg1-xNixMoO6-δ as Anode Materials for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: SMNM showed good chemical compatibility with Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-delta (SDC) but a slight reactivity with the electrolyte La0.8SrO2Ga0.83Mg0.17O3-delta (LSGM) at 1300 degrees C.
Titulo: Electrical, Chemical, and Electrochemical Properties of Double Perovskite Oxides Sr2Mg1-xNixMoO6-δ as Anode Materials for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The use of an SDC buffer layer could avoid the interface reaction between the SMNM anode and the LSGM electrolyte, resulting in better cell performance.
Titulo: Electrical, Chemical, and Electrochemical Properties of Double Perovskite Oxides Sr2Mg1-xNixMoO6-δ as Anode Materials for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The Sr2Mg0.3Ni0.7MoO6-delta electrode exhibited a maximal power density of 160 mW cm(-2) at 800 degrees C with an electrolyte (LSGM, 400 mu m)-supported cell configuration.
Titulo: Electrical, Chemical, and Electrochemical Properties of Double Perovskite Oxides Sr2Mg1-xNixMoO6-δ as Anode Materials for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
